researchResults.title: A Meta AI security researcher said an OpenClaw agent ran amok on her inbox
researchResults.description: The viral X post from an AI security researcher reads like satire. But it's really a word of warning about what can go wrong when handing tasks to an AI agent.

researchResults.title: With AI, investor loyalty is (almost) dead: At least a dozen OpenAI VCs now also back Anthropic
researchResults.description: While some dual investors are understandable, others were more shocking, and signal the disregard of a longstanding ethical conflict-of-interest rule.

researchResults.title: Anthropic accuses Chinese AI labs of mining Claude as US debates AI chip exports
researchResults.description: Anthropic accuses DeepSeek, Moonshot, and MiniMax of using 24,000 fake accounts to distill Claude’s AI capabilities, as U.S. officials debate export controls aimed at slowing China’s AI progress.

researchResults.title: Google’s Cloud AI leads on the three frontiers of model capability
researchResults.description: AI models are pushing against three frontiers at once: raw intelligence, response time, and a third quality you might call "extensibility."

researchResults.title: Canva acquires startups working on animation and marketing
researchResults.description: With the new acquisitions, the company wants to bolster its position as a marketing solution by potentially adding video creation and more granular measurement.

researchResults.title: NVIDIA Details New A.I. Chips and Autonomous Car Project With Mercedes
NVIDIA Unveils Faster AI Chips Sooner Than Expected
AI Impact Summit 2026
researchResults.description: A look at the partnerships and investments Google announced at the AI Impact Summit 2026.

researchResults.title: AI Impact Summit 2026: How we’re partnering to make AI work for everyone
researchResults.description: An overview of Google’s new global partnerships and funding announcements at the AI Impact Summit in India.
